action_description: This action will turn on Caavo Control Center and your TV.
This action will trigger any action on Caavo (i.e. “play Game of Thrones”, “tune to ESPN”, “set sleep timer to 20 minutes”, “search for holiday movies”)
This action will play, launch or tune to any channel, app, device, or content on Caavo Control Center.
This action will mute your TV or sound system.
This action will put Caavo Control Center to sleep and turn off your TV.
This action will display a notification on your TV.
